EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1323462554.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1323462554.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Karen,
Besides getting the I9 back to me, which you mentioned you will do next week, you have done everything on your end, (unless Merlin has any additional onboarding paperwork for you). I also emailed Linda to let her know you were completed on our side and to ask that she send me a SOW for your work at her convenience.
Please let me know if you have any additional questions for me.
Thank you and have a great weekend! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Karen Smith [mailto:karenlsmith@mac.com] Sent: Friday, December 09, 2011 12:34 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Thanks. I'm done with the form, then. No deductions additional until I've got more info from COBRA about healthcare. I emailed LInda Marks at Merlin, but haven't heard back yet. Anything else I need to do?
Karen On Dec 9, 2011, at 12:26 PM, Nicolette Taylor wrote:
Absolutely, you are automatically enrolled but only have to contribute if and when you want to.
Just decline for now if you would like to wait.
Thanks!
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Karen Smith [mailto:karenlsmith@mac.com] Sent: Friday, December 09, 2011 12:25 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Am I correct in assuming that I can join in the 401k at any time? I need to talk with my financial advisor about this.
Karen On Dec 9, 2011, at 11:49 AM, ntaylor@mbopartners.com wrote:
Dear Karen,
Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become a MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. Please begin enrollment by clicking here.Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions.At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to working with you.
Regards, Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6281 Toll Free: 800-556-0270 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300 Herndon, VA 20171 http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
